name: AssureSoft
tag_list: outsourcing, nearshore, software-development, application-development, web-development, mobile-application, qa, software-testing, testing-services, agile-development, java, database, android, iphone, ios, blackberry, ui-design, software-company-latin-amer
overview: With offices in Silicon Valley, AssureSoft is a full service nearshore software application development company with a multidisciplinary team of Developers, QA Engineers, Creative Designers, and Project Managers that work alongside your team, throughout your workday. AssureSoft specializes in Agile Development utilizing the latest mobile, cloud, web, and business application integration technologies and frameworks to provide our clients with cost-effective, flexible, scalable solutions. We help ISVs, Startups, and technology driven companies achieve a competitive edge. Companies that work with us, and experience what we can achieve, consistently entrust us with larger and more critical projects. We have an excellent, stable and experienced team of professionals with varied backgrounds and qualifications. Our development teams are flexible and can be resized and readjusted at any time upon customer request. The key to our success is simple – we deliver the highest quality, on time, with passion and commitment, and live by a core set of values every day. We have created a company that fosters long terms careers in a continual learning environment, with leading edge benefits, tools and resources.
